attributes.action: look hard and close at nurses pay rise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is  a insult to the nurses  for the years of traing they do. Goverment taxes have gone above the rate of inflation  and yet you expect them to take a pay cut where is the logic in this .You have awarded the service people a pay rise of between 3.3%and 9.2% are they not as important as the service personal .What will be the pay rise for the MPS i bet this wont be staggered and will be above inflation .They are life savers just the same  pay them the same stop making excuses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
